Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Alters the composition of the state board of parole
Summary: Alters the composition of the state board of parole to include members to be appointed upon the recommendation of the four legislative leaders.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to distributing the appointing authority of the state board of parole among the governor, senate and assembly
